name: Snorlax
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

abilities.name: Stir and Snooze
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Asleep, flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.

attacks.name: Sleepy Press
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Asleep.
